projects.title: Geowisata Lombok
projects.description: Geowisata Lombok is a digital explore Lombok website which was originally done for the NTB Tourism Office but stopped for several reasons. I'm working on this project together with friends, where I work on the backend and the frontend, and my friend is working on the geodesy side. The backend on this website uses native PHP and the frontend uses ReactJs.

projects.title: Portalnesia
projects.description: Portalnesia is a personal website which I use it to learn new things about coding. This website has actually been around since 2016 using the native PHP programming language. But on 2019, I decided to recreate using the NodeJs and ReactJs programming languages. Overall, this portalnesia project uses the php programming language, python, node js, and golang

projects.title: Portalnesia Native
projects.description: Portalnesia Native is an android application development from portalnesia website. This project started from my curiosity against the React Native multi-platform framework. The plan I will also recreate this project but using flutter framework.

projects.title: SansOrder
projects.description: SansOrder is a personal project that I made out of curiosity about the POS (Point of Sales) system. This website was created using a free CMS service, StrapiJs to facilitate the backend service. And using reactjs for the frontend service.

projects.title: Bali Simcard
projects.description: designed and developed a responsive website for Bali SIM Card, a service providing prepaid SIM cards for tourists visiting Bali. The website aims to facilitate tourists in purchasing and activating SIM cards before or upon arrival in Bali.
